name: Rooftop Racoon(Marathon Jam Demo)
description:
A short demo of my work in progress platformer and first serious project. This was created for the /r/solodev marathon jam. In this short demo, you will use your platforming skills to sneak into the Louvre through the Paris catacombs, defeat undead Da Vinci and make off with the Mona Lisa. Additional planned levels include Camelot, the Valley of the Kings and the Moon.

Controls:

Arrow keys for movement, WASD to aim and space to throw shuriken. Shift to sneak. M for menu and R for restart. Select "New" to start from the tutorial or "lvl" to directly select Paris.
